quotes.quote: Never forget what you are. The rest of the world will not. Wear it like armour, and it can never be used to hurt you.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: Winter Is Coming.
quotes.author: Eddard Stark

quotes.quote: You know nothing, Jon Snow.
quotes.author: Ygritte

quotes.quote: A man with no motive is a man no one suspects. Always keep your foes confused.
quotes.author: Petyr Baelish

quotes.quote: The man who passes the sentence should swing the sword.
quotes.author: Eddard Stark

quotes.quote: Any man who must say ‘I am the king’ is no true king.
quotes.author: Tywin Lannister

quotes.quote: Power resides where men believe it resides. It’s a trick, a shadow on the wall. And a very small man can cast a very large shadow.
quotes.author: Lord Varys

quotes.quote: A ruler who kills those devoted to her is not a ruler who inspires devotion.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die. There is no middle ground.
quotes.author: Cersei Lannister

quotes.quote: Chaos isn't a pit. Chaos is a ladder. Many who try to climb it fail and never get to try it again. The fall breaks them. And some are given a chance to climb. They refuse. They cling to the realm or the gods or love. Illusions. Only the ladder is real. The climb is all there is.
quotes.author: Petyr Baelish

quotes.quote: The world is overflowing with horrible things, but they’re all a tray of cakes next to death.
quotes.author: Olenna Tyrell

quotes.quote: Nothing f*cks you harder than time.
quotes.author: Davos Seaworth

quotes.quote: It is beautiful beneath the sea, but if you stay too long, you’ll drown.
quotes.author: Three-Eyed Raven

quotes.quote: The night is dark and full of terrors
quotes.author: Melisandre

quotes.quote: There is only one god and his name is Death, and there is only one thing we say to Death: ‘Not today.’
quotes.author: Syrio Forel

quotes.quote: The freedom to make my own mistakes was all I ever wanted.
quotes.author: Mance Rayder

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter what we want. Once we get it, then we want something else.
quotes.author: Petyr Baelish

quotes.quote: The things I do for love.
quotes.author: Jaime Lannister

quotes.quote: I have a tender spot in my heart for cripples, bastards and broken things.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: That's what I do: I drink and I know things.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: Oh, I'm a monster? Perhaps you should speak to me more softly then. Monsters are dangerous and just now Kings are dying like flies.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: Lannister, Targaryen, Baratheon, Stark, Tyrell... they're all just spokes on a wheel. This one's on top, then that one's on top, and on and on it spins, crushing those on the ground.
quotes.author: Daenerys Targaryen

quotes.quote: If you think this has a happy ending, you haven’t been paying attention.
quotes.author: Ramsay Bolton

quotes.quote: I don’t plan on knitting by the fire while men fight for me. I might be small, Lord Glover, and I might be a girl, but I am every bit as much a Northerner as you… and I don’t need your permission to defend the North.
quotes.author: Lyanna Mormont

quotes.quote: Money buys a man’s silence for a time. A bolt in the heart buys it forever.
quotes.author: Petyr Baelish

quotes.quote: The Lord of Light wants his enemies burned. The Drowned God wants them drowned. Why are all the gods such vicious c*nts? Where is the god of tits and wine?
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: Can a man still be brave if he’s afraid? That is the only time a man can be brave.
quotes.author: Eddard Stark

quotes.quote: The more people you love, the weaker you are.
quotes.author: Cersei Lannister

quotes.quote: Explain to me why it is more noble to kill 10,000 men in battle than a dozen at dinner.
quotes.author: Tywin Lannister

quotes.quote: People work together when it suits them. They’re loyal when it suits them. They love each other when it suits them, and they kill each other when it suits them.
quotes.author: Orell

quotes.quote: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The Man who doesn’t read lives only one
quotes.author: Jojen Reed

quotes.quote: Death is so final, yet life is full of possibilities.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: Everything’s better with some wine in the belly.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: When you tear out a man’s tongue, you are not proving him a liar, you’re only telling the world that you fear what he might say.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: I swear to you, sitting a throne is a thousand times harder than winning one.
quotes.author: Robert Baratheon

quotes.quote: A mind needs books like a sword needs a whetstone, if it is to keep its edge. That is why I read so much.
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that’s how they became powerful in the first place
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: What did father used to say? Everything before the word “but” is horse sh*t.
quotes.author: Jon Snow

quotes.quote: The contents of a man’s letters are more valuable than the contents of his purse
quotes.author: Lord Varys

quotes.quote: When I see what desire does to people, what it’s done to this country, I am very glad to have no part in it. Besides, the absence of desire leaves one free to pursue other things
quotes.author: Lord Varys

quotes.quote: I have been sold like a broodmare. I’ve been chained and betrayed, raped and defiled. Do you know what kept me standing through all those years in exile? Faith. Not in any gods, not in myths and legends - in myself.
quotes.author: Daenerys Targaryen

quotes.quote: You waste time trying to get people to love you, you’ll end up the most popular deadman in town
quotes.author: Bronn

quotes.quote: It is a big and beautiful world. Most of us live and die in the same corner where we were born in, never get to see any of it. I don’t want to be most of us.
quotes.author: Oberyn Martell

quotes.quote: People die at their dinner tables, they die in their beds, they die squatting over their chamber pots. Everybody dies sooner or later. And don’t worry about your death, worry about your life. Take charge of your life for as long as it lasts.
quotes.author: Petyr Baelish

quotes.quote: You are the few. We are the many. And when the many stop fearing the few…
quotes.author: The High Sparrow

quotes.quote: But who are we, hm? We have no names, no family. Every one of us is poor and powerless. And yet together, we can overthrow an empire
quotes.author: The High Sparrow

quotes.quote: The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that’s how they became powerful in the first place
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that’s how they became powerful in the first place
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister

quotes.quote: The powerful have always preyed on the powerless, that’s how they became powerful in the first place
quotes.author: Tyrion Lannister
